name: YeshivaWorldNewsFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Yeshiva World is the leading content provider in the orthodox Jewish community online. Don't miss a news story with this Alexa flash briefing skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
